folly.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a very stupid thing to do, especially one that is likely to have serious results
folly.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: Somerville bitterly regretted his folly at becoming involved.
It would be sheer folly to reduce spending on health education.
it would be folly to do something
folly.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: an unusual building that was built in the past as a decoration, not to be used or lived in
